note.p: References: Maurice Crosland, 'Explicit Qualifications as a Criterion for Membership of the Royal Society: A Historical Review' in NR 1982-83 vol 37 pp 167-187
J R Philip, 'Samuel Johnson as Antiscientist' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 193-203
P Fontes da Costa, 'The Culture of Curiosity at The Royal Society in the first half of the eighteenth century', NR 2002 vo 56 pp 147-166
Notes: DSB gives death date as 15 February 1736
